name: From Pixel to Plate: Honey and Nuts

metadata.name: From Pixel to Plate: Honey and Nuts
metadata.description:
The owner of this NFT can access the details of this molded 3D dish via [https://guild.xyz/honey-and-nuts](https://guild.xyz/honey-and-nuts) . That includes:

**-** the recipe, inspired by the essential ecosystem service provided by bees while pollinating thus creating honey, nuts and other food

**-** the story of its creator, the ‘Spanish Chocolate Master’ Ivan Pascual

MoodBytes is a company dedicated to innovation in the culinary world, which researches, develops and implements the latest trends and technologies related to the food world, improving all processes from cultivation to consumption, aiming to create a more sustainable, smart and shared gastronomy.
